channel.title: Making my self owner
channel.description: Im running the server rune evo and the client foxtrot and im trying to make my self owner but im not finding where to do it i look in character there in .p files and i dont know if i should change that file to something else or what im suppose to do.

item.title: Making my self owner
item.dc:creator: @FizzerX637 FizzerX637
item.description:
@FizzerX637 wrote:

[quote=“blazeitup, post:5, topic:553056”][quote author=FizzerX637 link=topic=671974.msg4496797#msg4496797 date=1443985704]
Try opening your character file and changing the playerRight…

Usually, it’ll be something like this
0 - player
1 - mod
2 - admin
3 - owner/co-owner
4- donator (if the coder has added that)
[/quote]

that’ll work awesome for a 317 lol but if you payed attention he mentioned hes using rune evo, which is like a 718/742 whatever it is, not really sure. but for 718+ I know it’s not like that… i might sound like an ass but im not trying, at all bruh lol
but… to answer your question… navigate to the player.java (99.8% sure its this file, might be wrong… :/) and look for something that looks like this

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Previous Owner's Username")) { rights = 2; }

and just change the according info… like the name and rights.[/quote]

Congrats to you for actually correcting me and helping him!
xD I didn’t realize he was using 700+, and I never have used 700+. I have only used 317-637, and I assumed that source was a 317 or PI. :palm: Thank you haha

Read full topic

item.title: Making my self owner
item.dc:creator: @blazeitup blazeitup
item.description:
@blazeitup wrote:

[quote=“FizzerX637, post:3, topic:553056”]Try opening your character file and changing the playerRight…

Usually, it’ll be something like this
0 - player
1 - mod
2 - admin
3 - owner/co-owner
4- donator (if the coder has added that)[/quote]

that’ll work awesome for a 317 lol but if you payed attention he mentioned hes using rune evo, which is like a 718/742 whatever it is, not really sure. but for 718+ I know it’s not like that… i might sound like an ass but im not trying, at all bruh lol
but… to answer your question… navigate to the player.java (99.8% sure its this file, might be wrong… :/) and look for something that looks like this

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Previous Owner's Username")) { rights = 2; }

and just change the according info… like the name and rights.

Read full topic

Usually, it’ll be something like this

4- donator (if the coder has added that)[/quote]

Make sure to open it as a notepad file.
